Attributes.AttributeToolTip: Schema's Tooltip messages that appear at the top of the Scheme Editor

Entries.Message: In the Scheme Table View, you can use arrow keys to navigate between table cells.
In the Scheme Table View, you can sort Entries by an Attribute using the 'Sort Ascending' and 'Sort Descending' options in the Attribute dropdown menu.
In the Scheme Table View, you can set the tooltip for an Attribute in Column Settings.
